statements: SELECT * FROM legal_cases;
SELECT case_name, case_type FROM legal_cases;
SELECT plaintiff_name, defendant_name FROM legal_cases;
SELECT * FROM legal_cases WHERE case_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM legal_cases WHERE resolution_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM legal_cases WHERE case_type = 'Civil';
SELECT * FROM legal_cases WHERE case_status = 'Closed';
SELECT case_id, case_name FROM legal_cases WHERE plaintiff_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM legal_cases WHERE defendant_name = 'Jane Smith';
SELECT * FROM legal_cases WHERE plaintiff_name = 'Alice Johnson' AND case_type = 'Criminal';
SELECT * FROM legal_cases WHERE case_type LIKE 'C%';
SELECT * FROM legal_cases WHERE resolution_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM legal_cases ORDER BY resolution_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM legal_cases WHERE case_status = 'Pending';
SELECT MAX(resolution_date) FROM legal_cases;
SELECT DISTINCT case_type FROM legal_cases;
SELECT AVG(CAST(case_id AS INTEGER)) FROM legal_cases;
SELECT * FROM legal_cases WHERE case_name LIKE '%ABC%';
SELECT * FROM legal_cases WHERE case_name LIKE 'The%';
SELECT * FROM legal_cases LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM legal_cases WHERE case_status = 'Closed';
SELECT case_name, case_type, plaintiff_name, defendant_name FROM legal_cases WHERE resolution_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT case_id, case_name FROM legal_cases WHERE plaintiff_name LIKE 'A%' AND defendant_name LIKE '%B';
SELECT case_id, case_name, resolution_date FROM legal_cases WHERE case_status = 'Closed' ORDER BY resolution_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_cases FROM legal_cases WHERE case_status = 'Pending';
SELECT case_id, case_name, case_type, plaintiff_name, defendant_name FROM legal_cases WHERE case_type IN ('Civil', 'Criminal') AND resolution_date IS NULL;
SELECT DISTINCT case_type FROM legal_cases;
SELECT MAX(resolution_date) AS latest_resolution_date FROM legal_cases WHERE case_status = 'Closed';
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(resolution_date, NOW())) AS average_resolution_days FROM legal_cases WHERE case_status = 'Closed';
SELECT plaintiff_name, COUNT(*) AS total_cases FROM legal_cases GROUP BY plaintiff_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT case_id, case_name, case_type FROM legal_cases WHERE resolution_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT defendant_name, MAX(resolution_date), MIN(resolution_date) FROM legal_cases GROUP BY defendant_name;
SELECT defendant_name, COUNT(*) AS total_cases FROM legal_cases WHERE case_status = 'Closed' GROUP BY defendant_name;
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(resolution_date, NOW())) AS avg_days_pending_resolution FROM legal_cases WHERE case_status = 'Pending';
SELECT case_id, case_name, case_type, plaintiff_name, case_status FROM legal_cases WHERE case_name LIKE '%vs%' AND defendant_name IS NOT NULL;
SELECT case_id, case_name, case_status, resolution_date FROM legal_cases WHERE plaintiff_name IN ('Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie');
SELECT case_id, case_name, case_status, resolution_date FROM legal_cases WHERE defendant_name NOT LIKE 'A%';
SELECT case_id, CASE WHEN case_status = 'Pending' THEN 'Open' ELSE 'Closed' END AS case_state FROM legal_cases;
SELECT DISTINCT plaintiff_name, defendant_name FROM legal_cases WHERE resolution_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY resolution_date ASC;
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(resolution_date, NOW())) AS avg_days_to_resolution FROM legal_cases WHERE resolution_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM legal_cases
SELECT case_name, case_status FROM legal_cases
SELECT case_id, case_name, case_type FROM legal_cases
SELECT * FROM case_parties
SELECT party_name, party_role FROM case_parties
SELECT party_id, party_contact FROM case_parties
SELECT * FROM legal_cases WHERE case_status = 'pending'
SELECT * FROM legal_cases WHERE case_type = 'civil'
SELECT * FROM legal_cases WHERE case_initiation_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM legal_cases WHERE case_resolution_date IS NULL
SELECT * FROM case_parties WHERE party_role = 'plaintiff'
SELECT * FROM case_parties WHERE party_contact LIKE '%@example.com'
SELECT * FROM case_parties WHERE party_role = 'defendant' AND case_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM legal_cases ORDER BY case_type ASC
SELECT * FROM legal_cases ORDER BY case_initiation_date DESC
SELECT party_name, case_name FROM case_parties INNER JOIN legal_cases ON case_parties.case_id = legal_cases.case_id
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM legal_cases
SELECT DISTINCT case_status FROM legal_cases
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(case_resolution_date, case_initiation_date)) AS resolution_time FROM legal_cases
SELECT * FROM legal_cases WHERE case_status = 'Open';
SELECT case_name, case_initiation_date FROM legal_cases WHERE case_initiation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM legal_cases WHERE case_type = 'Civil';
SELECT case_name, case_resolution_date FROM legal_cases WHERE case_resolution_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM legal_cases WHERE case_status = 'Closed';
SELECT case_name, case_type FROM legal_cases WHERE case_type = 'Criminal';
SELECT DISTINCT case_type FROM legal_cases;
SELECT * FROM legal_cases WHERE case_initiation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM legal_cases WHERE case_type LIKE '%iminal%';
SELECT case_name, case_type FROM legal_cases WHERE case_status = 'Open' OR case_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT party_name, party_role FROM case_parties WHERE party_role = 'Defendant';
SELECT * FROM case_parties WHERE party_contact LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM case_parties WHERE case_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT LC.case_name, CP.party_name FROM legal_cases LC INNER JOIN case_parties CP ON LC.case_id = CP.case_id;
SELECT * FROM case_parties WHERE party_role IN ('Plaintiff', 'Defendant');
SELECT * FROM case_parties WHERE party_name LIKE '%John%' AND party_role = 'Plaintiff';
SELECT CP.party_name, LC.case_name FROM case_parties CP INNER JOIN legal_cases LC ON CP.case_id = LC.case_id WHERE LC.case_status = 'Closed';
SELECT DISTINCT party_role FROM case_parties;
SELECT * FROM legal_cases ORDER BY case_initiation_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM case_parties WHERE party_role = 'Plaintiff';
SELECT * FROM cases;
SELECT case_name, case_type FROM cases;
SELECT case_name, case_type, case_status FROM cases WHERE case_status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM cases WHERE case_type = 'Civil';
SELECT * FROM case_parties;
SELECT party_name, party_role FROM case_parties;
SELECT party_name, party_contact FROM case_parties WHERE party_role = 'Plaintiff';
SELECT * FROM case_parties WHERE case_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM case_updates;
SELECT update_date, update_description FROM case_updates;
SELECT update_date, update_description FROM case_updates WHERE case_id = 1;
SELECT case_name, case_description FROM cases JOIN case_updates ON cases.case_id = case_updates.case_id;
SELECT case_name, party_name, party_role FROM cases JOIN case_parties ON cases.case_id = case_parties.case_id;
SELECT case_name, update_date, update_description FROM cases JOIN case_updates ON cases.case_id = case_updates.case_id;
SELECT count(*) AS total_cases FROM cases;
SELECT count(*) AS total_parties FROM case_parties;
SELECT case_name, COUNT(update_id) AS total_updates FROM cases JOIN case_updates ON cases.case_id = case_updates.case_id GROUP BY cases.case_id;
SELECT * FROM cases WHERE case_id = 1;
SELECT case_name, MAX(update_date) AS latest_update FROM cases JOIN case_updates ON cases.case_id = case_updates.case_id;
SELECT case_name, MIN(update_date) AS earliest_update FROM cases JOIN case_updates ON cases.case_id = case_updates.case_id;
SELECT * FROM cases;
SELECT case_id, case_name, case_type, case_status FROM cases;
SELECT * FROM cases WHERE case_type = 'criminal';
SELECT c.case_id, c.case_name, p.party_name, p.party_role FROM cases c JOIN case_parties p ON c.case_id = p.case_id;
SELECT c.case_id, c.case_name, cu.update_date, cu.update_description FROM cases c JOIN case_updates cu ON c.case_id = cu.case_id;
SELECT c.case_id, c.case_name, cu.update_date, cu.update_description FROM cases c JOIN case_updates cu ON c.case_id = cu.case_id WHERE cu.update_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT c.case_id, c.case_name, COUNT(p.party_id) AS number_of_parties FROM cases c JOIN case_parties p ON c.case_id = p.case_id GROUP BY c.case_id;
SELECT c.case_id, c.case_name, MAX(cu.update_date) AS last_update_date FROM cases c JOIN case_updates cu ON c.case_id = cu.case_id GROUP BY c.case_id;
SELECT c1.case_id, c1.case_name, c2.case_name AS previous_case_name FROM cases c1 LEFT JOIN cases c2 ON c1.case_id = c2.case_id - 1;
SELECT c.case_id, c.case_name, c.case_description, GROUP_CONCAT(p.party_name) AS parties FROM cases c JOIN case_parties p ON c.case_id = p.case_id GROUP BY c.case_id;
SELECT c.case_id, c.case_name, cu.update_date, cu.update_description FROM cases c LEFT JOIN case_updates cu ON c.case_id = cu.case_id WHERE cu.update_date IS NULL;
SELECT c.case_id, c.case_name, p.party_name, p.party_role FROM cases c JOIN case_parties p ON c.case_id = p.case_id WHERE p.party_role = 'lawyer';
SELECT c.case_id, c.case_name, cu.update_description FROM cases c JOIN case_updates cu ON c.case_id = cu.case_id WHERE cu.update_description LIKE '%hearing%';

SELECT c1.case_id, c1.case_name, cu.update_date FROM cases c1 JOIN case_updates cu ON c1.case_id = cu.case_id WHERE cu.update_date = (SELECT MAX(update_date) FROM case_updates WHERE case_id = c1.case_id);

SELECT c.case_id, c.case_name, p.party_name, cu.update_date FROM cases c JOIN case_parties p ON c.case_id = p.case_id JOIN case_updates cu ON c.case_id = cu.case_id WHERE cu.update_date = (SELECT MAX(update_date) FROM case_updates WHERE case_id = c.case_id);

SELECT c.case_id, c.case_name, p.party_name, cu.update_date FROM cases c JOIN case_parties p ON c.case_id = p.case_id JOIN case_updates cu ON c.case_id = cu.case_id WHERE cu.update_date = (SELECT MAX(update_date) FROM case_updates WHERE case_id = c.case_id) AND p.party_role = 'client';

SELECT c.case_id, c.case_name, cu.update_description, CONCAT_WS(' - ', p.party_name, p.party_contact) AS party_info FROM cases c JOIN case_parties p ON c.case_id = p.case_id JOIN case_updates cu ON c.case_id = cu.case_id;

SELECT c.case_id, c.case_name, cu.update_description, CONCAT_WS(' - ', p.party_name, p.party_contact) AS party_info FROM cases c JOIN case_parties p ON c.case_id = p.case_id JOIN case_updates cu ON c.case_id = cu.case_id WHERE cu.update_description IS NOT NULL;

SELECT c.case_id, c.case_name, cu.update_description, CONCAT_WS(' - ', p.party_name, p.party_contact) AS party_info FROM cases c JOIN case_parties p ON c.case_id = p.case_id JOIN case_updates cu ON c.case_id = cu.case_id WHERE cu.update_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY cu.update_date DESC;

SELECT c.case_id, c.case_name, cu.update_description, CONCAT_WS(' - ', p.party_name, p.party_contact) AS party_info FROM cases c JOIN case_parties p ON c.case_id = p.case_id JOIN case_updates cu ON c.case_id = cu.case_id WHERE cu.update_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY cu.update_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM case;
SELECT case_number, case_status FROM case;
SELECT * FROM parties;
SELECT party_name, party_type FROM parties;
SELECT * FROM documents;
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM documents;
SELECT * FROM hearings;
SELECT hearing_date, location FROM hearings;
SELECT id, case_number, date_initiated FROM case;
SELECT id, party_name, party_type FROM parties;
SELECT id, document_name, date_created FROM documents;
SELECT id, hearing_date, presiding_judge FROM hearings;
SELECT id, case_number, case_status, date_resolved FROM case;
SELECT case_number, party_name, party_type FROM case INNER JOIN parties ON case.id = parties.case_id;
SELECT document_name, document_type, case_number FROM documents INNER JOIN case ON documents.case_id = case.id;
SELECT presiding_judge, case_number, date_resolved FROM hearings INNER JOIN case ON hearings.case_id = case.id;
SELECT party_name, party_type, case_status FROM parties INNER JOIN case ON parties.case_id = case.id;
SELECT document_name, document_type, date_created FROM documents WHERE date_created > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM case WHERE date_initiated < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM hearings WHERE location LIKE '%court%';
SELECT id, case_number, case_status FROM case;
SELECT party_name, party_type FROM parties WHERE party_role = 'Plaintiff';
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM documents WHERE date_created >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM parties WHERE party_type = 'Attorney' AND party_role = 'Defense';
SELECT * FROM hearings WHERE location LIKE '%court%';
SELECT case_number, date_initiated, date_resolved FROM case WHERE date_resolved IS NOT NULL;
SELECT DISTINCT party_name FROM parties;
SELECT MAX(hearing_date) FROM hearings;
SELECT AVG(id) FROM case;
SELECT MAX(date_created) FROM documents WHERE document_type = 'Evidence';
SELECT case_number, COUNT(*) FROM documents GROUP BY case_id;
SELECT presiding_judge, COUNT(*) FROM hearings GROUP BY presiding_judge;
SELECT party_name, party_type FROM parties WHERE case_id IN (SELECT id FROM case WHERE date_resolved IS NULL);
SELECT * FROM case c JOIN parties p ON c.id = p.case_id;
SELECT case_number, MAX(hearing_date) FROM case JOIN hearings ON case.id = hearings.case_id GROUP BY case_number;
SELECT party_name, party_role FROM parties WHERE party_type = 'Witness' ORDER BY party_name ASC;
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(date_resolved, date_initiated)) AS avg_duration FROM case WHERE date_resolved IS NOT NULL;
SELECT party_name, COUNT(*) AS total_documents FROM parties JOIN documents ON parties.case_id = documents.case_id GROUP BY party_name;
SELECT case_number, COUNT(*) AS total_documents FROM case LEFT JOIN documents ON case.id = documents.case_id GROUP BY case_number;
SELECT party_name, COUNT(*) AS total_hearings FROM parties LEFT JOIN hearings ON parties.case_id = hearings.case_id GROUP BY party_name;
SELECT * FROM case WHERE date_resolved BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM CaseDetails;
SELECT case_name, case_status FROM CaseDetails;
SELECT case_id, case_name, case_status FROM CaseDetails WHERE case_status = 'Open';
SELECT * FROM CaseDetails WHERE case_resolution_date IS NULL;
SELECT party_name, party_type FROM CaseParties WHERE case_id = 1;
SELECT doc_name, doc_type FROM CaseDocuments WHERE case_id = 2;
SELECT note_date, note_content FROM CaseNotes WHERE case_id = 3;
SELECT status_date, status, status_description FROM CaseStatusHistory WHERE case_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM CaseDetails ORDER BY case_initiation_date DESC;
SELECT case_name, case_status FROM CaseDetails WHERE case_resolution_date > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT party_role, party_name FROM CaseParties WHERE party_type = 'Defendant';
SELECT doc_name, doc_type FROM CaseDocuments WHERE case_id = 5 AND doc_type = 'Report';
SELECT note_date, note_content FROM CaseNotes WHERE case_id = 6 AND note_date > '2022-03-01';
SELECT status_date, status, status_description FROM CaseStatusHistory WHERE case_id = 7 AND status = 'Closed';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_cases FROM CaseDetails;
SELECT MAX(case_initiation_date) AS latest_case_initiation FROM CaseDetails;
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(case_resolution_date, case_initiation_date)) AS avg_resolution_time FROM CaseDetails WHERE case_resolution_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT MIN(note_date) AS first_note_date FROM CaseNotes;
SELECT party_type, COUNT(*) AS party_count FROM CaseParties GROUP BY party_type;
SELECT DISTINCT status FROM CaseStatusHistory;
SELECT * FROM CaseDetails;
SELECT case_name, case_initiation_date FROM CaseDetails WHERE case_status='Open';
SELECT case_name, party_name, party_type FROM CaseDetails JOIN CaseParties ON CaseDetails.case_id = CaseParties.case_id;
SELECT * FROM CaseParties WHERE party_type='Plaintiff' AND party_role='Attorney';
SELECT doc_name, doc_type, LENGTH(doc_content) AS doc_size FROM CaseDocuments WHERE case_id=1001;
SELECT case_name, note_date, note_content FROM CaseDetails d JOIN CaseNotes n ON d.case_id = n.case_id WHERE d.case_status='Closed';
SELECT case_id, MAX(status_date) AS latest_status_date FROM CaseStatusHistory GROUP BY case_id;
SELECT party_name, COUNT(*) AS num_cases FROM CaseParties GROUP BY party_name ORDER BY num_cases DESC;
SELECT d.doc_name, COUNT(*) AS num_downloads FROM CaseDocuments d JOIN CaseDetails c ON d.case_id = c.case_id GROUP BY d.doc_name ORDER BY num_downloads DESC;

SELECT c.case_name, nh.status_date, nh.status FROM CaseDetails c JOIN (SELECT case_id, MAX(status_date) AS status_date, status FROM CaseStatusHistory GROUP BY case_id) nh ON c.case_id = nh.case_id ORDER BY nh.status_date DESC;
SELECT c.case_id, c.case_name, p.party_name, n.note_date, n.note_content FROM CaseDetails c LEFT JOIN CaseParties p ON c.case_id = p.case_id LEFT JOIN CaseNotes n ON c.case_id = n.case_id;

SELECT cd.case_id, cd.case_name, cp.party_name, cn.note_content FROM CaseDetails cd JOIN CaseParties cp ON cd.case_id = cp.case_id LEFT JOIN CaseNotes cn ON cd.case_id = cn.case_id WHERE cp.party_role='Defendant';
SELECT c.case_id, c.case_name, d.doc_name FROM CaseDetails c JOIN CaseDocuments d ON c.case_id = d.case_id WHERE LENGTH(d.doc_content) > 0;
SELECT CD1.case_id, CD1.case_name, CD2.case_name AS related_case FROM CaseDetails CD1 JOIN CaseDetails CD2 ON CD1.case_id != CD2.case_id;
SELECT c.case_name, ch.status_date, ch.status_description FROM CaseDetails c JOIN CaseStatusHistory ch ON c.case_id = ch.case_id WHERE ch.status='Resolved' ORDER BY ch.status_date DESC;

SELECT c.case_name, cp1.party_name AS plaintiff, cp2.party_name AS defendant FROM CaseDetails c JOIN CaseParties cp1 ON c.case_id = cp1.case_id JOIN CaseParties cp2 ON c.case_id = cp2.case_id WHERE cp1.party_type='Plaintiff' AND cp2.party_type='Defendant';
SELECT c.case_name, MAX(n.note_date) AS latest_note_date FROM CaseDetails c JOIN CaseNotes n ON c.case_id = n.case_id GROUP BY c.case_name;
SELECT c.case_id, COUNT(*) AS num_notes FROM CaseDetails c JOIN CaseNotes n ON c.case_id = n.case_id GROUP BY c.case_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;

SELECT c.case_name, cd.case_status, ch.status FROM CaseDetails cd JOIN CaseStatusHistory ch ON cd.case_id = ch.case_id JOIN (SELECT case_id, MAX(status_date) AS latest_status_date FROM CaseStatusHistory GROUP BY case_id) AS latest ON ch.case_id = latest.case_id AND ch.status_date = latest.latest_status_date;
SELECT c.case_name, cd.case_initiation_date, MAX(ch.status_date) AS latest_status_date FROM CaseDetails cd JOIN CaseStatusHistory ch ON cd.case_id = ch.case_id GROUP BY c.case_name;

SELECT cd.case_id, cd.case_name, cp.party_name, ch.status_date AS latest_status_date FROMCaseDetails cd JOIN (SELECT case_id, MAX(status_date) AS status_date FROM CaseStatusHistory GROUP BY case_id) ch ON cd.case_id = ch.case_id JOIN CaseParties cp ON cd.case_id = cp.case_id WHERE cp.party_type='Plaintiff';
